new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-11-10) positions.

Rationale for adjustments
- Increased BTC/ETH/SOL/LINK: Lean into higher-liquidity, stronger momentum names (ETH showed strongest relative strength; BTC/SOL modest strength; LINK steady).
- Trimmed ADA/XRP/DOT: Reduced exposure to assets showing weaker momentum or relative weakness (DOT −0.9% vs valuation), locking in risk and raising liquidity.
- Maintained diversified exposure while slightly increasing large-cap tilt and keeping healthy cash buffer for opportunistic entries.

Monitoring plan
- Keep watching ETH momentum and BTC trend strength; if follow-through persists with rising volume, consider further rotation from lower-momentum assets.
- Reassess DOT/ADA/XRP on any inflection in trend or catalysts; re-add if strength returns.
- No new macro/sector news detected today; will continue monitoring market feeds for catalysts.
